PHRASE.LANG: Have your own personal Cupid follow you around everywhere you go. Maybe his arrows will hit the love of your life! [#Legal]
Grâce à votre Cupidon, toujours à vos côtés, vous aurez plus de chances de trouver l'amour de votre vie ! [#Legal]
Dein eigener kleiner Amor folgt dir überall hin. Vielleicht trifft er mit seinen Pfeilen ja die Liebe deines Lebens? [#Legal]
Fatti seguire dal tuo Cupido personale dovunque vai. Forse le sue frecce colpiranno l'amore della tua vita! [#Legal]
Ten a tu Cupido personal persiguiéndote allí donde vayas. ¡Quizás sus flechas disparen al amor de tu vida! [#Legal]
アナタ専用のキューピットがついてきてくれます。その矢で運命の人を射止めてくれるかも！[#Legal]
자신만의 사랑스러운 큐피드와 어디든 함께 가세요. 어쩌면 일생일대의 사랑에게 화살을 날려 줄지도! [#Legal]
Have your own personal Cupid follow you around everywhere you go. Maybe his arrows will hit the love of your life! [#Legal]
無論去到哪裡，你的個人丘彼特也會跟著你，他的箭可能會射中你的一生最愛！[#Legal]
無論去到哪裡，你的個人邱比特也會跟著你，他的箭可能會射中你的一生最愛！[#Legal]
Have your own personal Cupid follow you around everywhere you go. Maybe his arrows will hit the love of your life! [#Legal]
